alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 6:25PM CDT until April 29 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CLAY AND WEST CENTRAL FILLMORE COUNTIES... At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fairfield, or 20 miles southeast of Hastings, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Clay Center around 645 PM CDT. Sutton, Harvard and Saronville around 700 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
